title: The Mellowrackz Interview: Getting Shot, Signing to XXXtentacion's Mom, Dating Kodak Black & More
description:
Mellow Rackz is only 20 and has already been through some of the hardest times. From the streets to making music, Mellow tells her story, everything she overcame and she found comfort in music.
https://www.instagram.com/mellowrackz/
